title: The Blonde Gang Killings
description: Two LAPD Detectives, Sandy Johnson and Kelvin Kim, investigate the kidnapping of a little girl and the murder of her parents. What they find is this case is the latest in a string of murders dating back many years, by psychotic serial killers nicknamed the Blonde Gang.Over their heads, they call in the FBI, who sends Agent Simon Leonard, a specialist in serial killers, who's been on the trail of the Blond Gang since their first murder.As the three of them embark on this harrowing journey to find the kidnapped girl and put a stop to the murders, their lives will forever be changed for the worse as they step into the heart of evil.
author: Jae  Lee
